resources:
DermaScan
DermaScan is a mobile app that uses AI-powered image analysis to help detect and monitor skin conditions in real-time. Simply upload a photo, and our AI quickly provides diagnostics and personalized skincare recommendations, empowering you to manage your skin health with early detection and expert advice.
DermaScan provides AI-based skin analysis, not a replacement for medical advice. Consult a doctor for professional evaluation.
We prioritize your privacy. Your data is secure, encrypted, and never shared without consent.
Enter your email address below, and we will send you a link to reset your password. Please check your inbox (and spam/junk folder, if necessary) for the reset email. Follow the instructions in the email to securely set a new password. If you don\'t receive the email within a few minutes, try again or contact our support team for further assistance.
